title: Remove 'Made by you' branding from bottom of app

requirements.text: Remove the 'Made by you' (or equivalent 'Made with AI' / watermark) branding element displayed at the bottom of the app, including any footer badges, attribution text, or watermark injected into AI-generated HTML output in llmService.ts.

quotes: remove made my you at the bottom

acceptanceCriteria: No 'Made by', 'Made with', or similar attribution/watermark text is visible at the bottom of any page in the app.
The Noventra.ai watermark string in frontend/src/services/llmService.ts is removed or left empty.
All other functionality and layout remain unaffected.

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Do not alter any backend logic or data models.
nonGoals: Removing or changing the Noventra.ai logo or brand identity in the header/navbar.
Any changes to backend code or API endpoints.
